actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for a study of the feasibility and desirability of establishing a proposed Ohio River National Parkway in the State of Indiana.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior, in consultation with the Secretary of Transportation, to conduct a study of the feasibility and desirability of establishing a proposed Ohio River National Parkway a study of Indiana. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a study of the feasibility and desirability of establishing a proposed Ohio River National Parkway in the State of Indiana.
